Solidity.zh_des: LayerZero V2OmNichain互操作性协议LayerZero是一种不变的、抗审查和无许可的消息传递协议，它连接区块链(60+和更多)，以实现区块链应用的全方位互操作性
Solidity.name: LayerZero-Labs /LayerZero-v2
Solidity.description: LayerZero V2Omnichain Interoperability ProtocolLayerZero is an immutable, censorship-resistant, and permissionless messaging protocol, that connects blockchains (60+ and counting) to enable omnichain interoperability for blockchain applications
